abstract: Study conducted as part of Irish Longitudinal Study on Aging finds that fluoridation of water supplies helps older people keep their teeth longer.
lead_paragraph: But the research from Ireland found that fluoridation had no effect on overall bone density in adults older than 50.

headline.main: Fluoridated Water Helps Older Adults Keep Teeth, Study Says
headline.print_headline: Fluoridated Water Helps Older Adults Keep Teeth

snippet: But the research from Ireland found that fluoridation had no effect on overall bone density in adults older than 50.
